name: Postal 2: Apocalypse Weekend
description:
Postal 2: Apocalypse Weekend is an action-shooter game developed by Running With Scissors. It was originally released in 2004. Running With Scissors published the game. Postal 2: Apocalypse Weekend has a Metascore of 45, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Postal 2: Apocalypse Weekend is available on PC.
Michael J. Riedel and Vince Desi produced the game. Michael J. Riedel directed the game.
